frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-prevent-double-empty-window
frozen.shortDescription: Set MIN_NUMBER_WORKSPACES to 1 so there is only one empty workspace when there are no windows open.
frozen.longDescription:
Set MIN_NUMBER_WORKSPACES to 1 so there is only one empty workspace when there are no windows open.
